# CAM::SET_CAM_VIEW_MODE_FOR_CONTEXT

## Summary
Sets the camera view mode for the specified context

## Parameters
* **CAM_VIEW_MODE_CONTEXT** context:
The view mode context to be configured.
See CAM_VIEW_MODE_CONTEXT enumeration.
* **CAM_VIEW_MODE** viewMode:
The view mode to be applied.
See CAM_VIEW_MODE enumeration.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
context: see _GET_CAM_ACTIVE_VIEW_MODE_CONTEXT, viewmode: see CAM.GET_FOLLOW_VEHICLE_CAM_VIEW_MODE
